summary: This is a calendar entry for a meeting with Mark Epstein scheduled for November 7, 2019. It appears to be a personal meeting, and an alarm was set for a reminder 15 minutes before the start time.

An alarm was set to display a reminder 15 minutes before the meeting start time.
